gateguide:
Welcome to the discord, if you are there for mercing please contact an officer if not already done.
If you are a new recruit an officer should already be taking care of you.
gaterules:
- Be respectful to everyone regardless of gender, race, orientation or religion
- Excessive usage of inappropriate language is not tolerated.
- No doxing or linking to any personal information outside from the origin of it.
- No witch-hunting/name-shaming.
gearhelp:
> Commands
`<classname> [succession|awakening] <ap> <aap> <dp>` - update your class and gear in the list
`?gear <name>` (any channel) - show the gear of the player by name
`?gear <mention>` (any channel) - show the gear of the player by mention
`?stats [classname]` (any channel) - show stats for all classes or specified class
or `?stats [dayname]` (any channel) - show info about players signed up as yes on specified day
